results.title: If You Plant Milkweed, They Will Come. (And Not Just the Butterflies.)
results.abstract: These underappreciated plants attract a “hungry throng” of beneficial insects. They’re not bad to look at, either.

media.caption: Common milkweed (Asclepias syriaca), the most widespread milkweed east of the Rocky Mountains, can colonize disturbed sites. But most of the more than 90 recognized North American species have a harder time making themselves at home.

results.title: Artists Call for Boycott After Artforum Fires Its Top Editor
results.abstract: Several artists have said they will stop working with the magazine after its response to an open letter that called for Palestinian liberation and a cease-fire.

media.caption: “I have never lived through a more chilling period,” said the artist Nan Goldin, who signed the open letter published on Artforum. “People are being blacklisted. People are losing their jobs.”

results.title: On Race, Mike Johnson Says His Views Were Shaped by Raising a Black Child
results.abstract: The new House speaker has kept his oldest son out of the public eye — except when the Republican talks about race.

media.caption: House Speaker Mike Johnson faces new scrutiny for his comments on race, which have sometimes included mention of his son Michael, whom Mr. Johnson says he took in 24 years ago and raised with his wife, Kelly.
